revision.comment:
New page: This is the 'Term' template. It should be called in the following format: 
 {{Term |also known as= |rarely labeled as= |definition= |example= |broader term= |narrower term= }}
Edit the page to see the template...
revision.text:
This is the 'Term' template. It should be called in the following format: 
{{Term
|also known as=
|rarely labeled as=
|definition=
|example=
|broader term=
|narrower term=
}}
Edit the page to see the template text. {| class="wikitable" ! also known as | {{#arraymap:{{{also known as|}}}|,|x|[[also known as::x]]}} |- ! rarely labeled as | {{#arraymap:{{{rarely labeled as|}}}|,|x|[[rarely labeled as::x]]}} |- ! definition | {{#arraymap:{{{definition|}}}|,|x|[[definition::x]]}} |- ! example | {{#arraymap:{{{example|}}}|,|x|[[example::x]]}} |- ! broader term | {{#arraymap:{{{broader term|}}}|,|x|[[broader term::x]]}} |- ! narrower term | {{#arraymap:{{{narrower term|}}}|,|x|[[narrower term::x]]}} |} [[Category:Term]]

revision.comment: New page: <noinclude> This is the 'Term' form. To add a page with this form, enter the page name below; if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page. {{#for...
revision.text:
<noinclude>
This is the 'Term' form.
To add a page with this form, enter the page name below;
if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page.

{{#forminput:Term}}

</noinclude><includeonly>
{{{for template|Term}}}
{| class="formtable"
! also known as:
| {{{field|also known as}}}
|-
! rarely labeled as:
| {{{field|rarely labeled as}}}
|-
! definition:
| {{{field|definition}}}
|-
! example:
| {{{field|example}}}
|-
! broader term:
| {{{field|broader term}}}
|-
! narrower term:
| {{{field|narrower term}}}
|}
{{{end template}}}

'''Free text:'''

{{{standard input|free text}}}


{{{standard input|summary}}}

{{{standard input|minor edit}}} {{{standard input|watch}}}

{{{standard input|save}}} {{{standard input|preview}}} {{{standard input|changes}}} {{{standard input|cancel}}}
</includeonly>
